mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS(M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, M_EMAIL1, M_EMAIL2, M_NUM, M_REGDATE) VALUES(#{mId},#{mPw},#{mName},#{mEmail1},#{mEmail2},#{mNum},to_char(sysdate,'rr.mm.dd'))
INSERT INTO MEMBERS(M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, M_EMAIL1, M_EMAIL2, M_NUM, M_REGDATE) VALUES(#{mId},'KAKAO',#{mName},#{mEmail1},#{mEmail2},'010-0000-0000',to_char(sysdate,'rr.mm.dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT M_ID, M_NAME, M_EMAIL1, M_EMAIL2, M_NUM, M_REGDATE FROM MEMBERS
SELECT M_ID, M_NAME, M_EMAIL1, M_EMAIL2, M_NUM, M_REGDATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE M_ID=#{mId}
SELECT M_ID, M_NAME, M_EMAIL1, M_EMAIL2, M_NUM, M_REGDATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE M_EMAIL1=#{mEmail1} AND M_EMAIL2=#{mEmail2}
SELECT M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, M_EMAIL1, M_EMAIL2, M_NUM, M_REGDATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE M_ID=#{mId} AND M_PW=#{mPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYFUNDING(MF_NUM, MF_MID, MF_PID) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MF_NUM), 0) + 1 FROM MYFUNDING),#{mfMid},#{mfPid})
mapper.select: SELECT a.M_ID, b.MF_NUM, b.MF_PID FROM MEMBERS a INNER JOIN MYFUNDING b ON a.M_ID = b.MF_MID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYLIKE(ML_NUM, ML_MID, ML_PID) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(ML_NUM), 0) + 1 FROM MYLIKE),#{mlMid},#{mlPid})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MYLIKE WHERE ML_MID=#{mlMid} AND ML_PID=#{mlPid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.M_ID, b.ML_NUM, b.ML_PID FROM MEMBERS a INNER JOIN MYLIKE b ON a.M_ID = b.ML_MID
SELECT ML_NUM,ML_MID,ML_PID FROM MYLIKE WHERE ML_PID=#{mlPid} AND ML_MID=#{mlMid}
SELECT COUNT(ML_NUM) AS ML_NUM FROM MYLIKE ML WHERE ML_MID=#{mlMid}
SELECT DISTINCT p.P_PRICE, p.P_NAME, p.P_AMOUNT, p.P_IMAGE1 FROM PRODUCT p, MYLIKE l, MEMBERS m WHERE p.P_NUM = l.ML_PID AND l.ML_MID = #{mlMid};
